statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_data;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, timestamp FROM transaction_data WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_data WHERE sender_address != receiver_address
SELECT AVG(amount) as average_amount, COUNT(*) as num_transactions FROM transaction_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_data WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_id = 'abc123';
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transactions FROM blocks WHERE prev_block_id = 'xyz456';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' OR receiver_address = 'Bob'
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN blocks ON transactions.transaction_id = blocks.block_id
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transactions) FROM blocks GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(transactions) > 3
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT block_id, block_hash, miner_address FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM blockchain WHERE height BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY height ASC
SELECT block_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-02-01';
SELECT t.sender_address, t.receiver_address, b.miner_address FROM transactions t JOIN blocks b ON t.transaction_id = b.block_id;
SELECT block_hash, COUNT(block_id) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain GROUP BY block_hash ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE public_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '123abc' AND receiver_address = '456def';
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY block_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE username NOT LIKE 'admin%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT block_id, total_transactions, total_amount FROM ledger WHERE total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.sender_wallet_address, w.balance FROM transactions t JOIN wallets w ON t.sender_wallet_address = w.wallet_address WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY w.balance ASC;

SELECT u.username, th.status, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE th.status = 'success' ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;

SELECT b.block_hash, b.previous_block_hash, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM blocks b JOIN transactions t ON b.block_id = t.transaction_id GROUP BY b.block_hash, b.previous_block_hash HAVING transaction_count > 10 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
